author: Kristina Peterson
title: Paul Ryan Rejects Giving Up Speaker Post Before January
text:
House Speaker Paul Ryan (R., Wis.) rejected Thursday any suggestion that he should step down as speaker before his stated intention to do so in January.
One day after announcing his decision not to run for re-election, Mr. Ryan pushed back against some chatter among GOP lawmakers and aides that he should relinquish his post earlier than planned, in order to let House Republicans unify around their next leader heading into a difficult midterm election in November.
... RELATED VIDEO House Speaker Paul Ryan: This Year Will Be My Last After announcing Wednesday that he will not seek re-election, House Speaker Paul Ryan explained how he came to the decision and fielded questions on whether his retirement could signal a grim outcome for the GOP in upcoming midterm elections. Photo: AP
